```{r}

invalid_data <- readRDS(file.path(path, "grouped_results_invalid_data.rds")) %>%ungroup() %>% arrange(tRFMO)%>%  distinct()
```

```{r echo=FALSE, results='asis'}

qflextable2(invalid_data, captionn = "Recap of the issues with each dataframe", grouped_data = c("tRFMO"))

```




```{r}

recap_mapping <- readRDS(file.path(path,"all_not_mapped_data.rds")) %>%ungroup() %>% arrange(source_authority) %>% distinct()

```


```{r echo=FALSE, results='asis'}

qflextable2(recap_mapping, captionn = "All the code not being mapped during the pre-harmonisation", grouped_data = c("source_authority"))

```



```{r}

recap_mapping <- readRDS(file.path(path,"recap_mapping.rds")) %>%ungroup() %>% arrange(source_authority) %>% distinct()

```


